abstract: Mark Emmert, the N.C.A.A. president, backs a proposal to up grants to $2,000 for student-athletes. But a group of athletes, via petition, clearly wants more. What do you think?
snippet: Mark Emmert, the N.C.A.A. president, backs a proposal to up grants to $2,000 for student-athletes. But a group of athletes, via petition, clearly wants more. What do you think?

headline.main: N.C.A.A.'s Grant Hike Proposal: Fair or Foul?
